page.title: 12CATTLE BREEDING CENTRE
page.content: The Cattle Breeding Centre opened in 1950.Behind the centre there is a big field where they put the bulls.They put all the bulls in the field from May to October.If the weather is good they may keep them out a bit longer. Most of the bulls are different ages.They have bulls from all over the country. The oldest bull is supposed to be 19.Some of the people look after the bulls,some work in an office and some are stockmen.The firm hope they will still be going in four or five years The bulls are used for Artificial Insemenation of the cows around here.
